pr_title: EQL: add the wildcard field type to the IT tests

timeline.message: Add wildcard field type as an option for randomized testing of IT queries
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into eql_wildcard_field_tests

timeline.bodyText: Does this setting make sense for wildcard?
timeline.author: costin

replies.bodyText: Yes, it's the only supported setting of a wildcard field type.
replies.author: astefan

timeline.bodyText: I would use a more descriptive name such as random_string_type or runtime_random_string_type.
timeline.author: costin

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into eql_wildcard_field_tests
